com.bumptech.glide.request.animation

Class BitmapCrossFadeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.request.animation.BitmapContainerCrossFadeFactory<Bitmap>
      • com.bumptech.glide.request.animation.BitmapCrossFadeFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlideAnimationFactory<Bitmap>

    public class BitmapCrossFadeFactory
extends BitmapContainerCrossFadeFactory<Bitmap>
    A cross fade GlideAnimation for Bitmaps that uses an TransitionDrawable to transition from an existing drawable already visible on the target to the new bitmap. If no existing drawable exists, this class can instead fall back to a default animation that doesn't rely on TransitionDrawable. The new bitmap is wrapped in a BitmapDrawable.
